description:
This 3-pack bundles a few pairs of Stance’s Core Run Tab socks together, saving you enough money to buy a couple of your favourite gels. These thin socks provide a light cushion between you and your shoes. The breathable and wicking fabric keep you cool and supported as you push through the kilometers.

  • FreshTek™ moisture and odour control uses performance mesh to keep you cool, maximizing airflow and breathability
  • Infiknit™ construction add durability to high-friction areas
  • Anatomical cushioning adds protection where you need it most
  • Left/right engineered arch support delivers a precise fit
  • Mesh venting panels
  • Seamless toe closure and engineered ankle protection for hotspot- and chafe-free wear
name: Stance Run Core Socks 3-Pack - Women's
